summary: CompositeAudioClip aggregates several individual audio clips into a single logical clip, handling their relative start times and automatically determining the overall duration when possible. It provides unified playback control and frame generation for the combined audio content.
business_intent: Enables audio editors, podcast producers, video post‑production tools, and any media workflow to build complex soundtracks from reusable pieces, simplifying mixing, timing adjustments, and export of a single audio track.
